document_data.name: ''Yargon''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Yargon''''' was a [[cursed]] [[dagger]] that could be found in the highest level of the catacombs of [[Darkmoon]].
document_data.Description: The cursed [[dagger]] had the equivalent of a ''âˆ’2'' enchantment, making it harder to hit with. It laid in the top left corner of the first sublevel of the temple, along with the cursed mace, [[Thumper]].
